description: Try our easy to follow Beef Jaffles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Jaffle & toastie,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Peanut free
name: Beef Jaffles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup small broccoli florets, finely chopped
0.66 cup baby spinach leaves (save.33 cup to serve)
1 fresh red chilli, sliced (optional, to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a non-stick fry pan over medium-high heat. Add beef mince and onion and cook for 3-4 minutes.
Add Moroccan spice and broccoli and cook for a further 1-2 minutes.
Preheat a jaffle maker. Spray one side of each of the slices of bread lightly with olive oil. Place the bread slices, oil side down, in the jaffle maker.

Divide spinach and beef mixture between bread, spreading to just inside the edges of the bread. Sprinkle evenly with cheese and top with the remaining slices of bread, oil side up. Close the jaffle maker and cook until the sandwiches are golden brown.
Cut jaffles in half and serve with tomato chutney, extra baby spinach leaves and chilli, if desired.
